sentences: Fouzieh Majd (also spelled Fozie Majd) (Persian: فوزیه مجد) is a Persian composer and ethnomusicologist.
She was educated in England and France.
In the 1970s she was the head of a group to gather Persian folk songs at NITV.
Listen to samples of Fozie Majd's piano works
Fozie Majd's works in celebration of International Women’s Day
